meta.title: Raging Echoes Mastery Picker
meta.description: Set a title, pick your masteries, screenshot and share
meta.ogImageAlt: A Selection of Masteries for the OSRS Raging Echoes League.

melee.title: Melee I
toolTipItems: Melee hits have a 25% chance to roll damage twice and take the highest result

melee.title: Melee II
toolTipItems: Melee hits have a 10% chance to generate an echo hit (Additional melee hit, 50% max-hit, respects Accuracy, PvM only)

melee.title: Melee III
toolTipItems: Melee attack rate set to 80%, rounding down

melee.title: Melee IV
toolTipItems: Melee hits have a 5% chance to heal 40% of damage dealt

melee.title: Melee V
toolTipItems: Melee attack rate set to 50%, rounded down for 5 and above, rounded up below 4

melee.title: Melee VI
toolTipItems: Your chance to generate a Melee echo increases to 20%, and your echoes can generate additional echoes (Up to 8 times in a row)

ranged.title: Ranged I
toolTipItems: Damage rolls beneath 30% of max hit with Ranged are increased to 30%

ranged.title: Ranged II
toolTipItems: Each subsequent Ranged attack has its max hit increased by an additional 5%. Resets after +20%

ranged.title: Ranged III
toolTipItems: Ranged attack rate set to 80%, rounding down

ranged.title: Ranged V
toolTipItems: Ranged attack rate set to 50%, rounded down for 5 and above, rounded up below 4

magic.title: Magic I
toolTipItems: When you roll above 90% of your max hit with Magic, damage is increased by 50%

magic.title: Magic II
toolTipItems: Magic max hit is increased by 5% per tick in-between your attacks (Up to +40%)

magic.title: Magic III
toolTipItems: Magic attack rate set to 80%, rounding down

magic.title: Magic IV
toolTipItems: When you roll above 90% of your max hit with Magic, heal 10% of damage dealt

magic.title: Magic V
toolTipItems: Magic attack rate set to 50%, rounded down for 5 and above, rounded up below 4

magic.title: Magic VI
toolTipItems: Max hit with Magic is increased by 1% for every 100 Hitpoints remaining on target (Up to 10%)
On a successful Magic hit, if your target has less Hitpoints than your max hit, you max hit
